name: Path of Redemption (Zombie Turn Based RPG Game)
name_original: Path of Redemption (Zombie Turn Based RPG Game)
description:
At year 2077 some incident happen in earth. Those incident causing 90% human died.

Then there 12 people who dedicated them self to save human from this unknown tragedy. All of this brave people try in every way to save human from extinction.

But they failed. To avoid this total annihilation. They make a time machine. 

Travel back to prevent all of this happen.... Yet they failed again. The rest of the crew who still survive decided to give their last fight. They make another time machine and travel back again 5 years before the incident happen. This time they gonna use Zabel plan. This time not only just 12 people who try to save humans from exctinction. This time every human in the earth has a strength to fight the greatest nightmare......

But can they success prevent the downfall of human?

this game features

-build and upgrade a home base for your community

-upgrade and customization your weapon

-Weapon animation, each gun has it`s own animation. for example if you use shotgun

the character will carry it and holding it when they in battle. but if you unequip. your character will bare handed. same as when you equip other gun.

-Recruiting playable character and support character for your home base.

-Action Sequances

-Romance ending

-crafting system

This is for game jam.  the proper demo will had more long story than this.

if you support this game. maybe i will consider make the demo plus.

All assets including graphic,animation,SV battlers and title screen art. those artist who made it. their name already put in the credits scene where demo game ended.
